fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Participation in ECTAA activities. ECTAA the European organization representing the national travel associations

membership:
I Danmark: Dansk Erhverv

goals__remit: Varetage den danske rejsebranches interesser overfor alle interessenter, herunder leverandører, kunder, politikere, offentlige myndigheder og andre interesseorganiationer
